text: @drdavidsamadi He’s a ssssssnake?  He’s flip-flopped repeatedly... lying about testing, meds, masks, even China’s honesty.  He was involved in approving funding of the virology institute in Wuhan and approval for their coronavirus gain-of-function studies that were banned here in US.
